Author: sloggingon
Text: I trust USDA reference information for produce and the like. It’s usually easy to find calories per 100g as well as per standard size produce item or whatever if you just include “USDA” as a search term.

Author: tseokii
Text: calorie counts are almost impossible to accurately measure anyway. there's just so much variability with prepared or prepackaged foods that it's not worth stressing too much over. I just use MFP and compare the calorie counts and go with my gut
